targets.query:
from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "env_air" and r._field == "temperature_c")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value: r.device, set: ${device:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn:(r)=>{
      age_ns = uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time)
      age_s  = float(v: age_ns) / 1000000000.0
      return { r with age_s: age_s }
  })
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.age_s < 30.0)   // “online” threshold
  |> group()                           // collapse to one table
  |> count(column: "device")           // -> outputs _value

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "env_air" and r._field == "temperature_c")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value: r.device, set: ${device:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn:(r)=>{
      age_ns = uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time)
      age_s  = float(v: age_ns) / 1000000000.0
      return { r with age_s: age_s }
  })
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.age_s >= 30.0)
  |> group()
  |> count(column: "device")

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "env_air" and r._field == "temperature_c")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value: r.device, set: ${device:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["device","_value"])
  |> group()

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "env_air" and r._field == "temperature_c")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value: r.device, set: ${device:json}))
  |> group(columns: ["device"])                     // one group per device for last()
  |> last()
  |> map(fn:(r)=>{
      age_ns = uint(v: now()) - uint(v: r._time)
      age_s  = float(v: age_ns) / 1000000000.0
      return {
        device: r.device,
        site: r.site,
        room: r.room,
        last_seen: r._time,
        age_s: age_s,
        online: if age_s < 30.0 then true else false
      }
  })
  |> group()                                        // <— ungroup so Grafana gets ONE table
  |> keep(columns: ["device","site","room","last_seen","age_s","online"])
  |> sort(columns: ["device"])

pm = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="air_particles" and r._field=="pm2_5")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with label: r.device + " • PM2.5" }))

dp = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="diff_pressure" and r._field=="dp_pa" and r.dp_path=="${dp_path}")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="" )
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with label: r.device + " • ΔP" }))

union(tables:[pm,dp])
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","label"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey:["label"], valueColumn:"_value")

panels.title: Dual-axis time series: PM2.5 vs ΔP (${dp_path})

targets.query:
hepa = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="diff_pressure" and r._field=="dp_pa" and r.dp_path=="hepa")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> rename(columns:{_value:"hepa"})
  |> keep(columns:["_time","device","hepa"])

wafer = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="diff_pressure" and r._field=="dp_pa" and r.dp_path=="wafer")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> rename(columns:{_value:"wafer"})
  |> keep(columns:["_time","device","wafer"])

join(tables:{a:hepa, b:wafer}, on:["_time","device"])
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r.hepa - r.wafer }))
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

pmFields = ["pm1_0","pm2_5","pm4_0","pm10"]

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "air_particles")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> contains(value: r._field, set: pmFields))
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["device","_field","_time","_value"])
  |> group(columns:["device","_field"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "air_particles" and r._field == "pm1_0")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["device","_time","_value"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "air_particles" and r._field == "pm2_5")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["device","_time","_value"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "air_particles" and r._field == "pm4_0")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["device","_time","_value"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "air_particles" and r._field == "pm10")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site == "${site}" or "${site}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room == "${room}" or "${room}" == "")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json} == [] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns:["device","_time","_value"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="co2_eq")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="voc_index")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> group(columns:["device"])

pm = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="air_particles" and r._field=="pm2_5")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with label: r.device + " • PM2.5" }))

iaq = from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="iaq")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every:v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty:false)
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","device"])
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with label: r.device + " • IAQ" }))

union(tables:[pm, iaq])
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","label"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey:["label"], valueColumn:"_value")

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="voc_index")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> group(columns:["device"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns:["device","_value"])
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns:{_value: "VOC index"})

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="co2_eq")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> group(columns:["device"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns:["device","_value"])
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns:{_value: "CO₂eq"})

from(bucket:"some_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement=="env_air" and r._field=="iaq")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.site=="${site}" or "${site}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.room=="${room}" or "${room}"=="")
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> ${device:json}==[] or contains(value:r.device,set:${device:json}))
  |> group(columns:["device"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns:["device","_value"])
  |> group()
   |> rename(columns:{_value: "IAQ"})

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "some_data",
  tag: "site",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "env_air",
  start: -30d
)
list.label: site
list.name: site
